cu.explanation_en: Setting DRB integrity to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause security configuration errors and potential connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting hardware log level to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and potential startup failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能造成啟動失敗。
